member.name: CSFV.cbSize
member.summary: The size of the CSFV structure, in bytes.

member.name: CSFV.pshf
member.summary: A pointer to the object for which to create the view.

member.name: CSFV.psvOuter
member.summary: A pointer to the parent interface. This parameter can be NULL.

member.name: CSFV.pfnCallback
member.summary: A pointer to the LPFNVIEWCALLBACK function used by this folder view to handle callback messages. This parameter can be NULL.
